body: This was just to present my idea that there will only be `torch::Tensor` in this API. Users should neither know about the concept of `at::Tensor` nor `autograd::Variable`. We will have to be careful when migrating existing users like StarCraft, but for new users there should only be `torch::Tensor` and nothing else (like in Python)

We will have to be careful when migrating existing users like StarCraft, but for new users there should only be torch::Tensor and nothing else (like in Python)
